entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, described as calling out to Ron and Hermione to close in on the key.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends, described as diving towards the key from above.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends, described as rocketing upwards to stop the key from going down.

entities.name: key
entities.description: The key is a damaged winged object that Harry and his friends are trying to catch.

relationships.description: Harry is pursuing the key, described as streaking after it and eventually catching it against the stone wall.
Ron is also trying to catch the key, described as diving towards it from above.
Hermione is trying to stop the key from going down, described as rocketing upwards to intercept it.
Harry and Ron are working together to catch the key, with Harry calling out instructions to Ron.
